name: Bepuzzled Puppy Dog Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
102 Cute puppy dog puzzles to complete!
Funny poses, cute poses, sincere poses, Birthday and Christmas puzzles.
Interesting dogs and environments.
Friendly User Interface for easy selection and 'magnetic' pieces for convenience.
Calming music, which can be muted.

What else could you need for a relaxing yet puzzling time?
